sub_title: Strategy & Technology Enthusiast | Data First Mindset | User Experience & CRO | Cross-Cultural Leadership
summary:
As the Head of Customer Success for Benelux and Nordics at Contentsquare, I lead a team of 15 professionals who help leading brands deliver personalized and engaging experiences to their customers across all digital channels. I am responsible for ~15M in ACV cross the two regions, achieving a QoQ gross retention rate of 92+%. With over 8 years of experience in the internet industry, I have a strong background in data-driven strategy consulting, user experience, and conversion rate optimization (CRO).

My mission is to enable and empower my clients to become data-driven rockstars, by providing them with the best-in-class tools, insights, and guidance to optimize their digital performance and achieve their business goals. I also facilitate the transformation of mindsets, drive the cultural shift of leadership and product teams, and encourage the replacement of digital guesswork with evidence-based optimization. I am passionate about technology, innovation, and customer-centricity, and I enjoy working in a dynamic and cross-cultural environment.

profile_positions.description:
- Growing the region to $15+M in ACV with a gross retention rate of 92+% QoQ, being the best region for 6 quarters in a row based on gross retention and net retention rates
- Taking on a second team within the wider Success organisation: Solution Expert team are responsible for the onboarding and continuous adoption of the tool
- Establishing new processes around upsell tracking of success sourced leads as well as putting new ways of working with executives in place to foster stronger customer relationships
profile_positions.title: Head of Customer Success, Benelux & Nordics

profile_positions.description:
- Leading a team of 8 Customer Success Managers across two regions, located in 3 countries.
- Building up the Customer Success function in a newly formed region from the ground up by establishing new processes and ways of working as well as leveraging the learnings and experience of the existing regions. 
- Growing the team from 2 CSMs to 8 CSMs in 12 months as well as the ACV from $5M to $12M.
profile_positions.title: Manager Customer Success, Benelux & Nordics

profile_positions.description:
• Delivering over $1.5M of annualized client engagements, including: building custom maturity model for 25+ IKEA product teams and quantifying experimentation program ROI to elevate importance of digital channels; supporting HEMA in driving >$6M in incremental testing revenue through their digital channels; helping Yoox/Net-A-Porter’s move CRO from Marketing to Data & Analytics while hiring an additional FTE
• Wrote the most-read blog series in company history, experimentation in the age of COVID. Held multiple webinars with technology partners such as Contentsquare. Wrote five articles for major publications including Finance Monthly
• Raised team billability from 40% to 55%. Developed 3 new services offerings that have been sold over 20 times. Developed all 7 services deliverables for our new Feature Management solution, which are used for all new Rollouts engagements globally
• Lead a cross-functional team to upskill the Professional Services organization on the new company strategy “Full Stack First”; lead a cross-functional team to explore and brainstorm a potential new strategy for the DACH go-to-market approach
profile_positions.title: Lead Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Delivered over $1M of client engagements, including: scaling experimentation to over 40 teams across the BBC; building a Center of Excellence at Farfetch that drives over 100 experiments per year; expanding experimentation to all major H&M sub-brands to drive the digital-first approach
• Written 5 articles, published in magazines including Information Age and Business Chief. Presented at 7 major conferences, including DMEXCO, Opticon19, and Women in Tech’s European Conference
• Hired and mentored second Strategy Consultant. Drove key projects, including new billability improvements, innovation processes, client benchmarks, and customizable maturity models 
• Drove EMEA-wide initiatives, including: 1) founded Value Management Team driving better pre- and post-sales alignment, 2) led agile Market Leadership Team that identified brand awareness gaps, created new sales materials and hosted events, and 3) built a knowledge-sharing initiative with over 10 Lunch & Learns held to date
profile_positions.title: Senior Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Delivered over $800K of client engagement, owning a >$4M ARR Book of Business, focused on scaling experimentation programs and driving their digital transformation, including: working with IcelandAir to build up their experimentation program from zero to improve their direct digital ticket and ancillary sales; driving Channel4’s testing program to go beyond web to OTT testing; supported AirFrance/KLM to scale experimentation from Data Analytics into >5 Product Teams 
• Lead the full-day Training Day at OPTICON’18 in Las Vegas around building a Center of Excellence and fostering the Culture of Experimentation
• Gained Scrum/Agile Product Owner Certification and enhanced the Strategy Consulting Team Collateral through new workshops, sessions and decks as well as standardized content across the global team
profile_positions.title: Strategy Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Created a new digitalization division, collaborate on studies in the field of “Internet of Things” and drove pitches focused on digital transformation projects among various large to medium sized businesses in Germany
• Conducted several projects during tenure: 1) a large enterprise in Chicago required to be restructured in various divisions in line with the transformation strategy, 2) a medium-sized business in Switzerland needed post-merger integration assistance to determine synergies across the two companies, 3) a small local player in Munich with new investors looked for us to provide mediator function between investors and business to install trust and deliver the right message across cultural challenges 
• Developed confirmatory due diligence presentations for the private equity division and contributed to acquisition projects as well as interviewed industry experts
profile_positions.title: Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Established the CRM team for WestwingNow from the ground up, responsible for 70% of weekly revenue of the company generated through CRM measure set up, including: conducting and responsible for all direct customer communication through the medium of e-mailing, such as newsletter, retargeting mailing, invitations and special mailings 
• Lead a team of >10 cross-functional team members to coordinate the weekly newsletters as well as A/B testing efforts and performance tracking
• Collaborated with the founders on a regular basis to ensure CRM measure were in line with company strategy as well as reported on findings and feedback from customers
profile_positions.title: CRM Manager WestwingNow

profile_positions.description:
•	Project 1 (4 weeks) Buying Assistant for Furniture & Lamps:
Establishing new relationships with >20 suppliers to expand the portfolio in the category to >3000 products
•	Project 2 (10 weeks) Team Lead of Editorial Team: 
Leading the first editorial content team of >3 to provide inspiring information to the customers on >6000 product pages pre-launch
•	Project 3 (8 weeks) Supply Chain Manager for Furniture & Lamps:
Developing new processes and strategies on shipment types and expanding the portfolio further as well as monitoring stock levels and collaborating with Buying & Marketing to determine the right stock level strategy
•	Project 4 (21 weeks) CRM Manager:
Leveraging the launch of initial CRM steps to attain and retain customers by building up a CRM process, team and strategy
profile_positions.title: Junior Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Analyzing in detail the various processes of the China-Project presenting the results through reports and regular meetings in close collaboration with project leaders of the individuals departments
profile_positions.title: Internship: Project Management China

profile_positions.description: Identifying suitable markets for launching ‘Wind for Prosperity’ in Asia Pacific, through a self-designed selecting process isolating five countries, concluding with an analysis of possible country-specific investors for the initiative
profile_positions.title: Business Project (CEMS)

company.name: RAXA Collective for The Muthoot Group

profile_positions.description: Established a disruptive innovative business model for a social-microenterprise on newspaper bag production through strategic and youthful thinking to regain market share, leveraging on multi-cultural teamwork and encouraging the participation of the local community resulting in a decrease in the plastic waste in the proximity of the Periyar Tiger Reserve
profile_positions.title: Consulting Intern (Team Leader)

profile_positions.description: Conceptualized ground handling operations along with publishing a compelling brochure containing excursion information for sales purposes for incoming tourists requiring cultural sensitivity, adaptability to the environment and a hard-working mindset
profile_positions.title: Destination Management Intern
